version_description:
8 Ball Pool Trickshots just arrived! Try out the new easy to play single player pool game:
- Highly realistic physics
- Unique table designs
- More than 100 levels to master
- Lots of awesome prizes and rewards
- Cool powers to help you up your game
- Awesome cues to collect

Thank you for being a part of the 8 Ball Pool Trickshots family! We've got some NEW exciting stuff waiting for you! Download NOW to...

- PLAY 160 NEW LEVELS! With a whole new tour, travel alongside the mystic Barcelona, discover the tricks of New York and visit the Great Wall.
- Get an awesome DAILY free reward by playing every day! More coins mean you can play even more levels! Come show us how it’s done.
- Get free rewards by just potting balls! Yes, you read it right! With POCKET rewards you can have a new challenge in every shot.

And that's not all! We've also tweaked the mechanics of some trickshots to make your experience even smoother and more relaxing.
What are you waiting for?! Download the new update NOW and get your hands on all the new content! Show us your best Trickshots!

We have an awesome update for the Trickshots family! We heard you and in this new update you will:

- Win FREE coins just by sharing the game with your friends!
- Be able to see your FRIENDS in the game! Keep up with their progress and show them who's boss!
- Get even MORE REWARDS with the Tour Bonus! Finish levels to win more coins and SPECIAL CUES!
- Play 240 NEW LEVELS! Challenge your skill with these new additional Trickshots!

We also tweaked some Trickshots to make your experience even smoother.
Download NOW our new update and enjoy all the awesome new content we have for you!

An exciting new update is available!
We're making changes to ensure our game gets even better for our Trickshots Family!

- FREE PLAY: Now you will not need coins to play! Just enter a level and show us your best shots!
- Conquer all cities' postcards to collect SPECIAL PRIZES!
- Get all available stars to unlock even BETTER CUES!

Let's play, there are 480 LEVELS ready for you!
Download NOW our new update and enjoy all this game has to offer you!

Hi Trickshots family, thanks for all the love! We have a fresh new update just for you:
• Show us that you are a Trickshot Master and conquer the GOLDEN CROWNS in every level - just beat them in the 1st try!
• Difficult shot? Use the new SNIPER AIM boost and overcome those tricky shots.
• LEVELS: We changed some of those tricky levels to give you a better experience!
• Your feedback was heard and we tweaked the Target Pocket selection!
• Love the game? We prepared an awesome Starter Pack to help you on those challenging levels!
Hit download NOW button and PLAY with the NEW features we prepared for you!

Hey there Trickshots family! We've got our new update just for you. In this new version we:

- Added a new space for your awesome cues! Now in the CUE ROOM, you can see in detail your cue collection!
- Tweaked your experience in the game by introducing THE COACH! He will help you learn everything you need about Trickshots!
- Changed the SHOP to help you see clearly what each bundle includes and get the best deal!
-Reviewed and gave some extra love to those levels you were finding too easy or challenging. Enjoy!

Thanks for sticking with us! Download NOW our new update and enjoy all the new content we have for you!
